song_lyrics: Tyāre ṭaḷe tan man tāp... Satasang kījīe° 1
Fare avayav ā re sharīrnā, parān paḷāy panḍnā pāp... Satasang kījīe° 2
Jem kīṭ maṭī thāy bhamarī, tene kīṭ kahe nahī koy... Satasang kījīe° 3
Jem pāras parase lohane, te to hem helāmāhī hoy... Satasang kījīe° 4
Jem chandan vāsathī vṛukṣhane, kare chandan samān soy... Satasang kījīe° 5
Jem malin jaḷ maḷe jāh‍navī, tene tarat kare gang toy... Satasang kījīe° 6
Trāmbā mahor palaṭe chhe pāṇīe, kare kanchanmay ras kūp... Satasang kījīe° 7
Tem sad‍guru mukhiyā santthī, thāy jant te sant swarūp... Satasang kījīe° 8
Shuk Nārad Vyās ne Vālmīki, e to īshvar kā’viyā āp... Satasang kījīe° 9
Dhruv Ambarīṣh Prah‍lād Vibhīṣhaṇ, thayā sukhiyā sant pratāp... Satasang kījīe° 10
Sant sarve sukh thavā ṭhām chhe, te to prasiddha kahe chhe purāṇ... Satasang kījīe° 11
Man karma vachane tu mānje, kahe Niṣhkuḷānand niravāṇ... Satasang kījīe° 12
title: Maḷe jīvan mukta te jogiyā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-432: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
